channel.title: Ip banning some dumb syi
channel.description:
Hi guys. dont quote me on this, as i got my new server a few days ago, and new to java and all.
So theres this one little asshole who keeps on syi'ing my server "Iwant10th23". I try to ip ban him, but it disconnects me. Yes i edited my client .java and set playeruser(unholy) or hwatever that line is called, and set my rights to 3.
If anyone can help an idiot like me that would be great.. Thanks!!
His ip is, weston-24.233.169.127.myacc.net

item.title: Ip banning some dumb syi
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

jmood128:

Just add his ip into the banned ip files and your good, you can also add an arraylist to your connections to make it so people can’t log in with more then the set amount.

Or this.

Read full topic

Server.java and set the limit connections to 2.
